title: Here’s Google’s new ‘Switch to Android’ app for iPhones [Gallery]
content:
Google is preparing to launch a brand new way to move from Apple’s iPhones to an Android device. Here’s your first look at Google’s “Switch to Android” app running on an iPhone.

more…

The post Here’s Google’s new ‘Switch to Android’ app for iPhones [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Google has prepared to launch "Switch to Android" a brand new way to move from Apple's iPhones to an Android device. Here it is in action.
